rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian style entrance with minimalistic design, natural light and neutral colors.
Spacious living area that reflects Scandinavian simplicity. Incorporates clean lines, functionality, and ample natural light.
Efficient layout with a modern farmhouse aesthetic. Built-in storage and an island counter provide both style and function.
Spacious bedroom with direct balcony access, natural light, and Scandinavian minimalist design; private gym adjacent.
Cozy guest bedroom featuring a private balcony. Vastu principles ensure the placement of windows for proper air flow.
Additional bedroom with a balcony ensuring sufficient sunlight and adherence to Vastu orientation.
Compact gym area adjacent to the master bedroom, designed for efficient workout routines. Incorporates storage solutions for equipment.
Two-car garage with modern Scandinavian design elements and ample space for parking.

notes: This design is tailored for a single-story Scandinavian farmhouse with a focus on minimalism, functionality, and adherence to local building norms and Vastu principles. All dimensions are approximate and should be verified by a professional architect.
